clients.title: Monitor Your "Google My Business" Listing for Unwanted Edits
description: As you may know, Google allows anyone to edit your Google My Business (GMB) listing. The unfortunate result of this feature is that people can submit (and Google may accept) erroneous changes to your listing information. We recommend closely monitoring your GMB listing for unwanted edits and updating it as needed. Depending on your circumstances, this monitoring may be necessary on a monthly, weekly or even daily basis. If you need help with or advice about updating information on your GMB listing, let our team know and we'll be happy to help!

jld.title: Increase Your Exposure to Prospective Clients With Justia Ask a Lawyer
description: Justia Ask A Lawyer provides a platform for non-lawyers to post basic legal questions online and get free responses from attorneys. Answering questions allows you to earn points and get noticed in our legal practice area forums. In turn, point leaders appear on highlighted leaderboards across our site. Sign up to receive an email in real time when a question is submitted in your practice area and locality, allowing you to be the first to answer a question and earn more points!
